faqs.q: How do I book a tour package?
faqs.a: You can book tours directly through our website by clicking 'Book Now', calling us at +91 6283315156, or visiting our office. We also support WhatsApp bookings for your convenience.

faqs.q: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.a: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, UPI, net banking, and direct bank transfers. Payment plans are available for premium packages.

faqs.q: Can I cancel or modify my booking?
faqs.a: Yes, you can cancel up to 7 days before the tour for a full refund. Modifications can be made anytime based on availability.
Travel insurance can be added during booking for an additional fee. We strongly recommend it for international trips.

faqs.q: What is included in the tour packages?
faqs.a: Most packages include accommodation, meals, guided tours, and transportation. Check the detailed itinerary for exact inclusions and exclusions.

faqs.q: Do you offer customized tour packages?
faqs.a: Absolutely! We offer fully customized tours tailored to your budget, preferences, and schedule. Contact us to discuss your requirements.
We recommend booking 30-45 days in advance for international tours and 15-21 days for domestic packages for better rates.
Yes, groups of 10 or more get special discounts. Contact our group travel specialist for customized quotes.
